## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r , echo=FALSE}
# Plotting chm
plot(veg_crop_allpred, col=viridis(10))
 
# Setting height thresholds (e.g. 10 meters)
threshold<-10
size<-c(1,1000) # m2

# Detecting forest gaps
gaps_duc<-getForestGaps(chm_layer=veg_crop_allpred, threshold=threshold, size=size)

# Plotting gaps
plot(gaps_duc, col="red", add=TRUE, main="Forest Canopy Gap", legend=FALSE)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
